content:
DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection Class

In this Article

The DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection class contains a collection of DirectoryAttributeModification objects.

Syntax

Declaration

public class DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection : System.Collections.CollectionBase

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Collections.CollectionBase
  • DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection

The Add method adds a DirectoryAttributeModification object to the collection.

The AddRange method adds an array of DirectoryAttributeModification objects to the collection.

The AddRange method adds a DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection object to the current collection.

The Contains method determines whether this DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection object contains a specified DirectoryAttributeModification object.
CopyTo(DirectoryAttributeModification[],Int32)

The CopyTo method copies the entire collection to a one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
IndexOf(DirectoryAttributeModification)

The IndexOf method returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified DirectoryAttributeModification object in the DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.

The Insert method inserts a DirectoryAttributeModification object into the DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection collection at the specified index.

The OnValidate method verifies that value is a DirectoryAttributeModification object.
Remove(DirectoryAttributeModification)

The Remove method removes the first occurrence of the specified DirectoryAttributeModification object from the collection.

      The index value of the DirectoryAttributeModification object.

Methods

  • Add(DirectoryAttributeModification)

    The Add method adds a DirectoryAttributeModification object to the collection.

    public int Add (System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification attribute);

    Parameters

    • attribute
      DirectoryAttributeModification

      The DirectoryAttributeModification to add.

    Returns

      The zero-based index in the collection where the DirectoryAttributeModification was added.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentException

      attribute is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

  • AddRange(DirectoryAttributeModification[])

    The AddRange method adds an array of DirectoryAttributeModification objects to the collection.

    public void AddRange (System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification[] attributes);

    Parameters

    • attributes
      DirectoryAttributeModification[]

      An array of DirectoryAttributeModification objects to add to the collection.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException

      attributes is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

    • ArgumentException

      One of the members of attributes is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

  • AddRange(DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection)

    The AddRange method adds a DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection object to the current collection.

    public void AddRange (System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection attributeCollection);

    Parameters

    • attributeCollection
      DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection

      The DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection collection to add to this collection.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException

      attributeCollection is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

  • Contains(DirectoryAttributeModification)

    The Contains method determines whether this DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection object contains a specified DirectoryAttributeModification object.

    public bool Contains (System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification value);

    Parameters

    • value
      DirectoryAttributeModification

      The DirectoryAttributeModification object for which to search.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the specified DirectoryAttributeModification is part of the collection; false otherwise.

  • CopyTo(DirectoryAttributeModification[],Int32)

    The CopyTo method copies the entire collection to a one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.

    public void CopyTo (System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification[] array, int index);

    Parameters

    • array
      DirectoryAttributeModification[]

      A one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection object.

    • index
      Int32

      The zero-based index of array where copying begins.

    Remarks

    Exceptions

    Exception Condition
    ArgumentNullException array is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
    ArgumentOutOfRangeException index is less than zero.
    ArgumentException array is multidimensional

    -or-

    The number of elements in the source DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.
    InvalidCastException The type of the source DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination array.
  • IndexOf(DirectoryAttributeModification)

    The IndexOf method returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified DirectoryAttributeModification object in the DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.

    public int IndexOf (System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification value);

    Parameters

    • value
      DirectoryAttributeModification

      The DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection object for which the index is returned.

    Returns

    • Int32

      The index value of the specified DirectoryAttributeModification object, if found; otherwise, -1.

  • Insert(Int32,DirectoryAttributeModification)

    The Insert method inserts a DirectoryAttributeModification object into the DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection collection at the specified index.

    public void Insert (int index, System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification value);

    Parameters

    • index
      Int32

      The zero-based index in the collection at which to insert the DirectoryAttributeModification object.

    • value
      DirectoryAttributeModification

      The DirectoryAttributeModification object to insert.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentException

      value is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

    • ArgumentOutOfRangeException

      index is less than zero, or index is greater than the number of elements in the DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection object.

  • OnValidate(Object)

    The OnValidate method verifies that value is a DirectoryAttributeModification object.

    protected override void OnValidate (object value);

    Parameters

    • value
      Object

      The object to evaluate.

    Remarks

    Exceptions

    Exception Condition
    ArgumentException value is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), or value is not a DirectoryAttributeModification object.
  • Remove(DirectoryAttributeModification)

    The Remove method removes the first occurrence of the specified DirectoryAttributeModification object from the collection.

    public void Remove (System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification value);

    Parameters

    • value
      DirectoryAttributeModification

      The DirectoryAttributeModification object to remove.
